name: test-exports-esbuild
description: Tests for the things exported by the langchain package

scripts.test: yarn run test:esm && yarn run test:cjs
scripts.test:esm: rm -rf dist-esm && esbuild --bundle src/* --outdir=dist-esm --platform=node --format=esm --external:'../node_modules/*' --external:'./node_modules/*' --supported:top-level-await=true && bash ./entrypoint.sh dist-esm
scripts.test:cjs: rm -rf dist-cjs && esbuild --bundle src/*.cjs --outdir=dist-cjs --platform=node --format=cjs --external:'../node_modules/*' --external:'./node_modules/*' --out-extension:.js=.cjs && bash ./entrypoint.sh dist-cjs

author: LangChain
